items.title: Russia targets Ukrainian energy infrastructure on Christmas Day
items.description: Russia's massive missile and drone barrage struck a thermal power plant and prompted Ukrainians to shelter in metro stations on Christmas morning.

items.title: 'The Bachelor,' Ukraine edition, features a veteran who lost both legs in the war
items.description: He wants to give hope to the tens of thousands of Ukrainians who have lost limbs since Russia's 2022 invasion of Ukraine.
